data.name: Godai: The depths of the water element.
data.description:
In the Yang Metal Clan everyone must master all 5 elements of the Godai before one is exhalted to Dan.
```
Godai (五大):
Earth - chi
Water - sui
Fire  - ka
Wind  - fu
Void  - ku
```
The water element is of paramount concern, in order to have stillness of mind one must conquer sui (water).

In the context of programming we consider recursion the water element.

Given a positive integer n return the amount of times the function recursively calls itself.

```
>>> water_element(8)
36
>>> "Given n = 8, the function recursive calls 36"
```
Find the water element(n).

Be sure to see the test cases for more info.

NOTE: 
- Python's maximum rescursion depth is 996 by default, return the count not the recursion depth.
- Contributions and translations are welcome.
